dashboard.label: Advisor
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_HRDC23yw":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"showRowNumbers":true,"columnFormat":{"Inventory ID":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("Inventory ID") | formatByType(Inventory_IDColumnFormatEditorConfig)"}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_za7aFNmj"},"context":{"Inventory_IDColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"string":{"unitPosition":"after"}}}}},"dataSources":{"ds_za7aFNmj":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"bundle = "rhel" AND application = "advisor" AND NOT _raw | 
 eval mytime=strftime(_time,"%m-%d-%Y %l:%M:%S %p") | 
 fields account_id, mytime, "context.inventory_id", "events.report_url" |
 fields - _* | 
 rename account_id as "Account ID", mytime as "Time", context.inventory_id as "Inventory ID", events.report_url as "Report URL""},"name":"advisor_search"},"ds_FtZKnx31_ds_za7aFNmj":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"event_type = "advisor" AND NOT _raw | fields "_time", "context.inventory_id", "events.report_url", "timestamp""},"name":"Copy of advisor_search"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_HRDC23yw","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":300}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"description":"Advisor Dashboard","title":"Advisor Dashboard"}
